record.field.name: reeval.alerts
record.file.name: ocmoptions

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), retrieves each Alert associated with the quote or order and process it.

detail.detail: If the alert status is active, Service Manager reevaluates the alert condition and updates the alert to reflect the correct status.
If the alert status is not active, Service Manager reevaluates the alert condition.
If the condition is true, Service Manager:
- Sets the last action to Recalc.
- Sets the action time to the current date/time.
If the condition is true, Service Manager recalculates the Alert Time and updates the status to Scheduled.
If the condition is false, Service Manager sets the status to Not Required.
